timeline.message: chore(gateway): move config test into proper package
fix(broker): removed obsolete reference to maxMessageCount

fix(broker): removed reference to ineffective 'contactPoint'

This setting had no effect, because in EmbeddedGatewayCfg.init() it gets overwritten to the address of the networks internal api

timeline.bodyText: Nit: as this is testing configuration parsing and not just the BrokerCfg class, I'd leave it as ConfigurationTest.
timeline.author: npepinpe
